Job Description: Looking for the Best Front End Developers out there!      Job Opening for Frontend Developer in Nadiad      We are looking for a   Front    End    Developer   who is ready to take challenges.    Responsibilities:    Convert wireframes/mockups to actual code that will produce visual elements of the application. You will closely with graphical design team and technical team, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.    You Do:    Design, build and configure applications to meet business process and application requirements.    Must have skills:     HTML5      CSS3      JQUERY      JAVASCRIPT      REST / Web services     Good to have skills:     React JS      React Native      Angular JS      Ember JS      Webpack      GIT
